General.Name: Guangzhou Restaurants Group Co
General.Description: Guangzhou Restaurant Group Company Limited owns and operates restaurants in China and internationally. Its restaurants primarily offer moon cakes, moon cake fillings, zongzi, Chinese New Year's Eve foods; frozen foods, such as walnut buns, barbecued pork buns, quicksand buns, glutinous rice chicken, shrimp dumplings, and other snacks; and Cantonese-style sausages, Chinese-style pastries and cakes, western cakes, Poon Choi cooked dishes, and other food items. The company owns restaurants under the Guangzhou Restaurant, Tao Tao Ju, Likoufu, Autumn Wind, Liang Feng Garden, and other brand names. It has 31 directly operated restaurants. The company was founded in 1935 and is based in Guangzhou, China. Guangzhou Restaurant Group Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Guangzhou Urban Construction Investment Group Co., Ltd.
